6// mtl_state_cache.h:
7// Defines the class interface for StateCache, RenderPipelineCache and various
8// C struct versions of Metal sampler, depth stencil, render pass, render pipeline descriptors.
9//
10
11#ifndef LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_MTL_STATE_CACHE_H_
12#define LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_MTL_STATE_CACHE_H_

14#import <Metal/Metal.h>

16#include <unordered_map>

18#include "libANGLE/State.h"

23static inline bool operator==(const MTLClearColor &lhs, const MTLClearColor &rhs);

25namespace angle

27struct FeaturesMtl;

30namespace rx
31{
32class ContextMtl;

34namespace mtl
35{
36struct alignas(1) StencilDesc
37{
38 bool operator==(const StencilDesc &rhs) const;
39
40 // Set default values
41 void reset();
42
43 // Use uint8_t instead of MTLStencilOperation to compact space
44 uint8_t stencilFailureOperation : 3;
45 uint8_t depthFailureOperation : 3;
46 uint8_t depthStencilPassOperation : 3;
47
48 // Use uint8_t instead of MTLCompareFunction to compact space
49 uint8_t stencilCompareFunction : 3;
50
51 uint8_t readMask : 8;
52 uint8_t writeMask : 8;
53};
54
55struct alignas(4) DepthStencilDesc
56{
57 DepthStencilDesc();
58 DepthStencilDesc(const DepthStencilDesc &src);
59 DepthStencilDesc(DepthStencilDesc &&src);
60
61 DepthStencilDesc &operator=(const DepthStencilDesc &src);
62
63 bool operator==(const DepthStencilDesc &rhs) const;
64
65 // Set default values.
66 // Default is depth/stencil test disabled. Depth/stencil write enabled.
67 void reset();
68
69 size_t hash() const;
70
71 void updateDepthTestEnabled(const gl::DepthStencilState &dsState);
72 void updateDepthWriteEnabled(const gl::DepthStencilState &dsState);
73 void updateDepthCompareFunc(const gl::DepthStencilState &dsState);
74 void updateStencilTestEnabled(const gl::DepthStencilState &dsState);
75 void updateStencilFrontOps(const gl::DepthStencilState &dsState);
76 void updateStencilBackOps(const gl::DepthStencilState &dsState);
77 void updateStencilFrontFuncs(const gl::DepthStencilState &dsState);
78 void updateStencilBackFuncs(const gl::DepthStencilState &dsState);
79 void updateStencilFrontWriteMask(const gl::DepthStencilState &dsState);
80 void updateStencilBackWriteMask(const gl::DepthStencilState &dsState);
81
82 StencilDesc backFaceStencil;
83 StencilDesc frontFaceStencil;
84
85 // Use uint8_t instead of MTLCompareFunction to compact space
86 uint8_t depthCompareFunction : 3;
87 bool depthWriteEnabled : 1;
88};
89
90struct alignas(4) SamplerDesc
91{
92 SamplerDesc();
93 SamplerDesc(const SamplerDesc &src);
94 SamplerDesc(SamplerDesc &&src);
95
96 explicit SamplerDesc(const gl::SamplerState &glState);
97
98 SamplerDesc &operator=(const SamplerDesc &src);
99
100 // Set default values. All filters are nearest, and addresModes are clamp to edge.
101 void reset();
102
103 bool operator==(const SamplerDesc &rhs) const;
104
105 size_t hash() const;
106
107 // Use uint8_t instead of MTLSamplerAddressMode to compact space
108 uint8_t rAddressMode : 3;
109 uint8_t sAddressMode : 3;
110 uint8_t tAddressMode : 3;
111
112 // Use uint8_t instead of MTLSamplerMinMagFilter to compact space
113 uint8_t minFilter : 1;
114 uint8_t magFilter : 1;
115 uint8_t mipFilter : 2;
116 uint8_t normalizedCoordinates: 1;
117
118 uint8_t maxAnisotropy : 5;
119
120 // Use uint8_t instead of MTLCompareFunction to compact space
121 uint8_t compareFunction : 3;
122};
123
124struct VertexAttributeDesc
125{
126 inline bool operator==(const VertexAttributeDesc &rhs) const
127 {
128 return format == rhs.format && offset == rhs.offset && bufferIndex == rhs.bufferIndex;
129 }
130 inline bool operator!=(const VertexAttributeDesc &rhs) const { return !(*this == rhs); }
131
132 // Use uint8_t instead of MTLVertexFormat to compact space
133 uint8_t format : 6;
134 // Offset is only used for default attributes buffer. So 8 bits are enough.
135 uint8_t offset : 8;
136 uint8_t bufferIndex : 5;
137};
138
139struct VertexBufferLayoutDesc
140{
141 inline bool operator==(const VertexBufferLayoutDesc &rhs) const
142 {
143 return stepFunction == rhs.stepFunction && stepRate == rhs.stepRate && stride == rhs.stride;
144 }
145 inline bool operator!=(const VertexBufferLayoutDesc &rhs) const { return !(*this == rhs); }
146
147 uint32_t stepRate;
148 uint32_t stride;
149
150 // Use uint8_t instead of MTLVertexStepFunction to compact space
151 uint8_t stepFunction;
152};
153
154struct VertexDesc
155{
156 VertexAttributeDesc attributes[kMaxVertexAttribs];
157 VertexBufferLayoutDesc layouts[kMaxVertexAttribs];
158
159 uint8_t numAttribs;
160 uint8_t numBufferLayouts;
161};
162
163struct BlendDesc
164{
165 bool operator==(const BlendDesc &rhs) const;
166 BlendDesc &operator=(const BlendDesc &src) = default;
167
168 // Set default values
169 void reset();
170 void reset(MTLColorWriteMask writeMask);
171
172 void updateWriteMask(const gl::BlendState &blendState);
173 void updateBlendFactors(const gl::BlendState &blendState);
174 void updateBlendOps(const gl::BlendState &blendState);
175 void updateBlendEnabled(const gl::BlendState &blendState);
176
177 // Use uint8_t instead of MTLColorWriteMask to compact space
178 uint8_t writeMask : 4;
179
180 // Use uint8_t instead of MTLBlendOperation to compact space
181 uint8_t alphaBlendOperation : 3;
182 uint8_t rgbBlendOperation : 3;
183
184 // Use uint8_t instead of MTLBlendFactor to compact space
185 // NOTE(hqle): enum MTLBlendFactorSource1Color and above are unused.
186 uint8_t destinationAlphaBlendFactor : 4;
187 uint8_t destinationRGBBlendFactor : 4;
188 uint8_t sourceAlphaBlendFactor : 4;
189 uint8_t sourceRGBBlendFactor : 4;
190
191 bool blendingEnabled : 1;
192};
193
194struct alignas(2) RenderPipelineColorAttachmentDesc : public BlendDesc
195{
196 bool operator==(const RenderPipelineColorAttachmentDesc &rhs) const;
197 inline bool operator!=(const RenderPipelineColorAttachmentDesc &rhs) const
198 {
199 return !(*this == rhs);
200 }
201
202 // Set default values
203 void reset();
204 void reset(MTLPixelFormat format);
205 void reset(MTLPixelFormat format, MTLColorWriteMask writeMask);
206 void reset(MTLPixelFormat format, const BlendDesc &blendState);
207
208 void update(const BlendDesc &blendState);
209
210 // Use uint16_t instead of MTLPixelFormat to compact space
211 uint16_t pixelFormat : 16;
212};
213
214struct RenderPipelineOutputDesc
215{
216 bool operator==(const RenderPipelineOutputDesc &rhs) const;
217
218 void updateEnabledDrawBuffers(gl::DrawBufferMask enabledBuffers);
219
220 RenderPipelineColorAttachmentDesc colorAttachments[kMaxRenderTargets];
221
222 // Use uint16_t instead of MTLPixelFormat to compact space
223 uint16_t depthAttachmentPixelFormat : 16;
224 uint16_t stencilAttachmentPixelFormat : 16;
225
226 static_assert(kMaxRenderTargets <= 4, "kMaxRenderTargets must be <= 4");
227 uint8_t numColorAttachments : 3;
228 uint8_t sampleCount : 5;
229};
230
231
232// Some SDK levels don't declare MTLPrimitiveTopologyClass. Needs to do compile time check here:
233#if !(TARGET_OS_OSX || TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST) && \
234 (!defined(__IPHONE_12_0) || ANGLE_IOS_DEPLOY_TARGET < __IPHONE_12_0)
235# define ANGLE_MTL_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_CLASS_AVAILABLE 0
236using PrimitiveTopologyClass = uint32_t;
237constexpr PrimitiveTopologyClass kPrimitiveTopologyClassTriangle = 0;
238constexpr PrimitiveTopologyClass kPrimitiveTopologyClassPoint = 0;
239#else
240# define ANGLE_MTL_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_CLASS_AVAILABLE 1
241using PrimitiveTopologyClass = MTLPrimitiveTopologyClass;
242constexpr PrimitiveTopologyClass kPrimitiveTopologyClassTriangle =
243 MTLPrimitiveTopologyClassTriangle;
244constexpr PrimitiveTopologyClass kPrimitiveTopologyClassPoint = MTLPrimitiveTopologyClassPoint;
245#endif
246
247enum class RenderPipelineRasterization : uint32_t
248{
249 // This flag is used for vertex shader not writing any stage output (e.g gl_Position).
250 // This will disable fragment shader stage. This is useful for transform feedback ouput vertex
251 // shader.
252 Disabled,
253
254 // Fragment shader is enabled.
255 Enabled,
256
257 // This flag is for rasterization discard emulation when vertex shader still writes to stage
258 // output. Disabled flag cannot be used in this case since Metal doesn't allow that. The
259 // emulation would insert a code snippet to move gl_Position out of clip space's visible area to
260 // simulate the discard.
261 EmulatedDiscard,
262
263 EnumCount,
264};
265
266template <typename T>
267using RenderPipelineRasterStateMap = angle::PackedEnumMap<RenderPipelineRasterization, T>;
268
269struct alignas(4) RenderPipelineDesc
270{
271 RenderPipelineDesc();
272 RenderPipelineDesc(const RenderPipelineDesc &src);
273 RenderPipelineDesc(RenderPipelineDesc &&src);
274
275 RenderPipelineDesc &operator=(const RenderPipelineDesc &src);
276
277 bool operator==(const RenderPipelineDesc &rhs) const;
278 size_t hash() const;
279 bool rasterizationEnabled() const;
280
281 VertexDesc vertexDescriptor;
282
283 RenderPipelineOutputDesc outputDescriptor;
284
285 // Use uint8_t instead of PrimitiveTopologyClass to compact space.
286 uint8_t inputPrimitiveTopology : 2;
287
288 bool alphaToCoverageEnabled : 1;
289
290 // These flags are for emulation and do not correspond to any flags in
291 // MTLRenderPipelineDescriptor descriptor. These flags should be used by
292 // RenderPipelineCacheSpecializeShaderFactory.
293 RenderPipelineRasterization rasterizationType : 2;
294 bool emulateCoverageMask : 1;
295};
296
297struct alignas(4) ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc
298{
299 ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc();
300 ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc(const ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &src);
301 ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc(const ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &&src);
302
303 ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &operator=(const ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &src);
304
305 bool operator==(const ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &rhs) const;
306 bool operator!=(const ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &rhs) const;
307 size_t hash() const;
308
309 gl::PrimitiveMode primitiveMode;
310 uint8_t elementType;
311 bool primitiveRestartEnabled;
312};
313
314struct RenderPassAttachmentTextureTargetDesc
315{
316 TextureRef getTextureRef() const { return texture.lock(); }
317 TextureRef getImplicitMSTextureRef() const { return implicitMSTexture.lock(); }
318 bool hasImplicitMSTexture() const { return !implicitMSTexture.expired(); }
319 uint32_t getRenderSamples() const
320 {
321 TextureRef tex = getTextureRef();
322 TextureRef msTex = getImplicitMSTextureRef();
323 return msTex ? msTex->samples() : (tex ? tex->samples() : 1);
324 }
325
326 TextureWeakRef texture;
327 // Implicit multisample texture that will be rendered into and discarded at the end of
328 // a render pass. Its result will be resolved into normal texture above.
329 TextureWeakRef implicitMSTexture;
330 MipmapNativeLevel level = kZeroNativeMipLevel;
331 uint32_t sliceOrDepth = 0;
332 bool blendable = true;
333};
334
335struct RenderPassAttachmentDesc
336{
337 RenderPassAttachmentDesc();
338 // Set default values
339 void reset();
340
341 bool equalIgnoreLoadStoreOptions(const RenderPassAttachmentDesc &other) const;
342 bool operator==(const RenderPassAttachmentDesc &other) const;
343
344 ANGLE_INLINE TextureRef texture() const
345 {
346 return renderTarget ? renderTarget->getTextureRef() : nullptr;
347 }
348 ANGLE_INLINE TextureRef implicitMSTexture() const
349 {
350 return renderTarget ? renderTarget->getImplicitMSTextureRef() : nullptr;
351 }
352 ANGLE_INLINE bool hasImplicitMSTexture() const
353 {
354 return renderTarget ? renderTarget->hasImplicitMSTexture() : false;
355 }
356 ANGLE_INLINE uint32_t renderSamples() const
357 {
358 return renderTarget ? renderTarget->getRenderSamples() : 1;
359 }
360 ANGLE_INLINE MipmapNativeLevel level() const
361 {
362 return renderTarget ? renderTarget->level : kZeroNativeMipLevel;
363 }
364 ANGLE_INLINE uint32_t sliceOrDepth() const
365 {
366 return renderTarget ? renderTarget->sliceOrDepth : 0;
367 }
368 ANGLE_INLINE bool blendable() const { return renderTarget ? renderTarget->blendable : false; }
369
370 // This is shared pointer to avoid crashing when texture deleted after bound to a frame buffer.
371 std::shared_ptr<RenderPassAttachmentTextureTargetDesc> renderTarget;
372 MTLLoadAction loadAction;
373 MTLStoreAction storeAction;
374 MTLStoreActionOptions storeActionOptions;
375};
376
377struct RenderPassColorAttachmentDesc : public RenderPassAttachmentDesc
378{
379 inline bool operator==(const RenderPassColorAttachmentDesc &other) const
380 {
381 return RenderPassAttachmentDesc::operator==(other) && clearColor == other.clearColor;
382 }
383 inline bool operator!=(const RenderPassColorAttachmentDesc &other) const
384 {
385 return !(*this == other);
386 }
387 MTLClearColor clearColor = {0, 0, 0, 0};
388};
389
390struct RenderPassDepthAttachmentDesc : public RenderPassAttachmentDesc
391{
392 inline bool operator==(const RenderPassDepthAttachmentDesc &other) const
393 {
394 return RenderPassAttachmentDesc::operator==(other) && clearDepth == other.clearDepth;
395 }
396 inline bool operator!=(const RenderPassDepthAttachmentDesc &other) const
397 {
398 return !(*this == other);
399 }
400
401 double clearDepth = 0;
402};
403
404struct RenderPassStencilAttachmentDesc : public RenderPassAttachmentDesc
405{
406 inline bool operator==(const RenderPassStencilAttachmentDesc &other) const
407 {
408 return RenderPassAttachmentDesc::operator==(other) && clearStencil == other.clearStencil;
409 }
410 inline bool operator!=(const RenderPassStencilAttachmentDesc &other) const
411 {
412 return !(*this == other);
413 }
414 uint32_t clearStencil = 0;
415};
416
417//
418// This is C++ equivalent of Objective-C MTLRenderPassDescriptor.
419// We could use MTLRenderPassDescriptor directly, however, using C++ struct has benefits of fast
420// copy, stack allocation, inlined comparing function, etc.
421//
422struct RenderPassDesc
423{
424 RenderPassColorAttachmentDesc colorAttachments[kMaxRenderTargets];
425 RenderPassDepthAttachmentDesc depthAttachment;
426 RenderPassStencilAttachmentDesc stencilAttachment;
427
428 void convertToMetalDesc(MTLRenderPassDescriptor *objCDesc) const;
429
430 // This will populate the RenderPipelineOutputDesc with default blend state and
431 // MTLColorWriteMaskAll
432 void populateRenderPipelineOutputDesc(RenderPipelineOutputDesc *outDesc) const;
433 // This will populate the RenderPipelineOutputDesc with default blend state and the specified
434 // MTLColorWriteMask
435 void populateRenderPipelineOutputDesc(MTLColorWriteMask colorWriteMask,
436 RenderPipelineOutputDesc *outDesc) const;
437 // This will populate the RenderPipelineOutputDesc with the specified blend state
438 void populateRenderPipelineOutputDesc(const BlendDesc &blendState,
439 RenderPipelineOutputDesc *outDesc) const;
440
441 bool equalIgnoreLoadStoreOptions(const RenderPassDesc &other) const;
442 bool operator==(const RenderPassDesc &other) const;
443 inline bool operator!=(const RenderPassDesc &other) const { return !(*this == other); }
444
445 uint32_t numColorAttachments = 0;
446 uint32_t sampleCount = 1;
447};
448
449} // namespace mtl
450} // namespace rx
451
452namespace std
453{
454
455template <>
456struct hash<rx::mtl::DepthStencilDesc>
457{
458 size_t operator()(const rx::mtl::DepthStencilDesc &key) const { return key.hash(); }
459};
460
461template <>
462struct hash<rx::mtl::SamplerDesc>
463{
464 size_t operator()(const rx::mtl::SamplerDesc &key) const { return key.hash(); }
465};
466
467template <>
468struct hash<rx::mtl::RenderPipelineDesc>
469{
470 size_t operator()(const rx::mtl::RenderPipelineDesc &key) const { return key.hash(); }
471};
472
473template <>
474struct hash<rx::mtl::ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc>
475{
476 size_t operator()(const rx::mtl::ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &key) const { return key.hash(); }
477};
478} // namespace std

480namespace rx
481{
482namespace mtl
483{
484
485// Abstract factory to create specialized vertex & fragment shaders based on RenderPipelineDesc.
486class RenderPipelineCacheSpecializeShaderFactory
487{
488 public:
489 virtual ~RenderPipelineCacheSpecializeShaderFactory() = default;
490 // Get specialized shader for the render pipeline cache.
491 virtual angle::Result getSpecializedShader(Context *context,
492 gl::ShaderType shaderType,
493 const RenderPipelineDesc &renderPipelineDesc,
494 id<MTLFunction> *shaderOut) = 0;
495 // Check whether specialized shaders is required for the specified RenderPipelineDesc.
496 // If not, the render pipeline cache will use the supplied non-specialized shaders.
497 virtual bool hasSpecializedShader(gl::ShaderType shaderType,
498 const RenderPipelineDesc &renderPipelineDesc) = 0;
499};
500
501// Abstract factory to create specialized provoking vertex compute shaders based off of
502// compute shader pipeline descs
503
504class ProvokingVertexCacheSpecializeShaderFactory
505{
506 public:
507 virtual ~ProvokingVertexCacheSpecializeShaderFactory() = default;
508 // Get specialized shader for the render pipeline cache.
509 virtual angle::Result getSpecializedShader(Context *context,
510 gl::ShaderType shaderType,
511 const ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &renderPipelineDesc,
512 id<MTLFunction> *shaderOut) = 0;
513 // Check whether specialized shaders is required for the specified RenderPipelineDesc.
514 // If not, the render pipeline cache will use the supplied non-specialized shaders.
515 virtual bool hasSpecializedShader(gl::ShaderType shaderType,
516 const ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &renderPipelineDesc) = 0;
517};
518
519// render pipeline state cache per shader program
520class RenderPipelineCache final : angle::NonCopyable
521{
522 public:
523 RenderPipelineCache();
524 RenderPipelineCache(RenderPipelineCacheSpecializeShaderFactory *specializedShaderFactory);
525 ~RenderPipelineCache();
526
527 // Set non-specialized vertex/fragment shader to be used by render pipeline cache to create
528 // render pipeline state. If the internal
529 // RenderPipelineCacheSpecializeShaderFactory.hasSpecializedShader() returns false for a
530 // particular RenderPipelineDesc, the render pipeline cache will use the non-specialized
531 // shaders.
532 void setVertexShader(Context *context, id<MTLFunction> shader);
533 void setFragmentShader(Context *context, id<MTLFunction> shader);
534
535 // Get non-specialized shaders supplied via set*Shader().
536 id<MTLFunction> getVertexShader() { return mVertexShader; }
537 id<MTLFunction> getFragmentShader() { return mFragmentShader; }
538
539 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLRenderPipelineState>> getRenderPipelineState(ContextMtl *context,
540 const RenderPipelineDesc &desc);
541
542 void clear();
543
544 protected:
545 // Non-specialized vertex shader
546 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLFunction>> mVertexShader;
547 // Non-specialized fragment shader
548 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLFunction>> mFragmentShader;
549 // On shader with emulated rasterization discard, one without
550
551 private:
552 void clearPipelineStates();
553 void recreatePipelineStates(Context *context);
554 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLRenderPipelineState>> insertRenderPipelineState(
555 Context *context,
556 const RenderPipelineDesc &desc,
557 bool insertDefaultAttribLayout);
558 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLRenderPipelineState>> createRenderPipelineState(
559 Context *context,
560 const RenderPipelineDesc &desc,
561 bool insertDefaultAttribLayout);
562
563 bool hasDefaultAttribs(const RenderPipelineDesc &desc) const;
564
565 // One table with default attrib and one table without.
566 std::unordered_map<RenderPipelineDesc, AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLRenderPipelineState>>>
567 mRenderPipelineStates[2];
568 RenderPipelineCacheSpecializeShaderFactory *mSpecializedShaderFactory;
569};
570
571// render pipeline state cache per shader program
572class ProvokingVertexComputePipelineCache final : angle::NonCopyable
573{
574 public:
575 ProvokingVertexComputePipelineCache();
576 ProvokingVertexComputePipelineCache(ProvokingVertexCacheSpecializeShaderFactory *specializedShaderFactory);
577 ~ProvokingVertexComputePipelineCache();
578
579 // Set non-specialized vertex/fragment shader to be used by render pipeline cache to create
580 // render pipeline state. If the internal
581 // RenderPipelineCacheSpecializeShaderFactory.hasSpecializedShader() returns false for a
582 // particular RenderPipelineDesc, the render pipeline cache will use the non-specialized
583 // shaders.
584 void setComputeShader(Context *context, id<MTLFunction> shader);
585 id<MTLFunction> getComputeShader() { return mComputeShader; }
586
587
588 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLComputePipelineState>> getComputePipelineState(ContextMtl *context,
589 const ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &desc);
590
591 void clear();
592
593 protected:
594 // Non-specialized compute shader
595 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLFunction>> mComputeShader;
596
597 private:
598 void clearPipelineStates();
599 void recreatePipelineStates(Context *context);
600 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLComputePipelineState>> insertComputePipelineState(
601 Context *context,
602 const ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &desc);
603
604 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLComputePipelineState>> createComputePipelineState(
605 Context *context,
606 const ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &desc);
607
608 bool hasDefaultAttribs(const RenderPipelineDesc &desc) const;
609
610 // One table with default attrib and one table without.
611 std::unordered_map<ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc, AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLComputePipelineState>>>
612 mComputePipelineStates;
613 ProvokingVertexCacheSpecializeShaderFactory *mSpecializedShaderFactory;
614};
615
616
617
618
619
620class StateCache final : angle::NonCopyable
621{
622 public:
623 StateCache(const angle::FeaturesMtl &features);
624 ~StateCache();
625
626 // Null depth stencil state has depth/stecil read & write disabled.
627 inline AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLDepthStencilState>> getNullDepthStencilState(Context *context)
628 {
629 return getNullDepthStencilState(context->getMetalDevice());
630 }
631 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLDepthStencilState>> getNullDepthStencilState(id<MTLDevice> device);
632 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLDepthStencilState>> getDepthStencilState(id<MTLDevice> device,
633 const DepthStencilDesc &desc);
634 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLSamplerState>> getSamplerState(id<MTLDevice> device, const SamplerDesc &desc);
635 // Null sampler state uses default SamplerDesc
636 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLSamplerState>> getNullSamplerState(Context *context);
637 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLSamplerState>> getNullSamplerState(id<MTLDevice> device);
638 void clear();
639
640 private:
641 const angle::FeaturesMtl &mFeatures;
642
643 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLDepthStencilState>> mNullDepthStencilState = nil;
644 std::unordered_map<DepthStencilDesc, AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLDepthStencilState>>> mDepthStencilStates;
645 std::unordered_map<SamplerDesc, AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLSamplerState>>> mSamplerStates;
646};
647
648} // namespace mtl
649} // namespace rx
650
651static inline bool operator==(const rx::mtl::VertexDesc &lhs, const rx::mtl::VertexDesc &rhs)
652{
653 if (lhs.numAttribs != rhs.numAttribs || lhs.numBufferLayouts != rhs.numBufferLayouts)
654 {
655 return false;
656 }
657 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < lhs.numAttribs; ++i)
658 {
659 if (lhs.attributes[i] != rhs.attributes[i])
660 {
661 return false;
662 }
663 }
664 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < lhs.numBufferLayouts; ++i)
665 {
666 if (lhs.layouts[i] != rhs.layouts[i])
667 {
668 return false;
669 }
670 }
671 return true;
672}
673
674static inline bool operator==(const MTLClearColor &lhs, const MTLClearColor &rhs)
675{
676 return lhs.red == rhs.red && lhs.green == rhs.green && lhs.blue == rhs.blue &&
677 lhs.alpha == rhs.alpha;
678}
